ys get their signal through.

 recorded it I would bet there was all kinds of info on it, sometimes they =
start, at least for me, they started like more evp's=A0 then real time, now=
 they do both, and at times,=A0they are all chating at once it seems.=A0 I =

age dated 8/14/2009 8:53:51 A.M. Eastern Daylight Time, cozykat2003@ yahoo.=
com writes:
> > =A0

ot heard anything.=A0 I am wondering too if the spirits are still listening=
 to me and letting me get my "feet wet" before they will speak to me.=A0 I =
have been polite and have used both AM and FM bands.=A0 I tell them who I a=
m, the day, time and location.=A0 I let them know my purpose for communicat=
ing and I ask for their help.=A0 I am being patient with the process.

> > >Thanks so much, Misty. I will see if I can ask them to spe=
ak as one, because I think you hit the nail right on the head -- I do hear =
them speaking over each other, half in male, half in female, so maybe thing=
s would improve like you said if they organized into one collective voice. =
Can they still answer questions about individuals this way, or are you limi=
ted to generalized queries?
> > >
> > >Regarding your statement: "Quite oft=
en when a new speaker
> > >comes forth a bit of a training session can be h=
eard for how they can
> > >speak so that my physical self can hear what is =
said." So by this, do you mean it's possible it takes a couple of sessions =
for the entity to master this new method of communication? For instance, I =
got my grandmother' s name (among others) during Tuesday's session, but she=
 said nothing, wouldn't answer our questions; Wednesday, she suddenly start=
ed talking and was the primary person we communicated with, even correctly =
answered my mother's questions about her childhood pets. Could this be beca=
use there's a learning curve involved with talking through the radio? Does =
it take a session or two before they "get the hang of it"? Or is it all dep=
endent on my skills?
> > >
> > >Oh, and wanted to say I'm going out tomorro=
w to buy all the canned goods at the grocery store in anticipation of the n=
uclear winter we are about to endure... Just kidding. Hearing about all tha=
t stuff they are predicting, it does make me wonder, though, why they would=
 go to such trouble to tell you all that again and again -- what's to gain =
from it? It's not stirring anybody up. 
> > >
> > >
> >
